resources.string: His Grace Devakinandan Prabhu App is collection of kirtans, Vaishnava Bhajans and lectures by His Grace Devakinandan Prabhu.\n His Grace Devakinandan Prabhu is a disciple of HH Mahavishnu Gosvami Maharaj (Elder). He is a practicing lawyer by profession and is based in Singapore. By the order of his spiritual master, and since his departure from this material world, Prabhu has been travelling extensively and preaching the message of Srimad Bhagavatam in many parts of the world. He is also tasked with overseeing the management of the Krishna conscious preaching centre in Singapore, as well as the ISKCON temples in Dwaraka and Rajkot, Gujarat. Devakinandan Prabhu is also an expert preacher of Srimad Bhagavatam and a wonderful Kirtan leader. Many have taken to Krishna Consciousness just by hearing his Kirtans.
With His Grace Devakinandan Prabhu App, you have access to vast collection of His Grace Devakinandan Prabhu\'s lectures and kirtans, Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s Books, Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s daily quotes.
